about_the_game:
Hammer Dudes is a casual 2D platform fighter. Dodge, throw and strike with your hammer to defeat your opponent and reach their final scene! Play on the couch with a buddy or even online in this competitve and crazy 1v1 game.

Squashing your opponent allows you to advance to the next scene where your rival respawns to face your again and halt your progress. Defeating your opponent in their end scene wins you the game.

Different maps keep each duel exciting and present new obstacles and hazards for players to overcome and adapt to. Use each playing field to your advantage or feel the weight of your opponent's hammer.

Combat and movement is kept simple with only a dodge to evade attacks and a hammer throw and stike to squash your opponent. Nevertheless, combat is competitive, fast paced and keeps you on the edge of your seat. Challenge your friends and settle your feuds in Hammer Dudes!
